document.full_text: luis salazar, a minor league manager in the atlanta braves' system, lost an eye after he was struck in the face by a line drive while watching a spring training game.
document.title: baseball roundup: manager hit by line drive loses an eye
lines_and_colors: luis salazar, a minor league manager in the atlanta braves' system, lost an eye after he was struck in the face by a line drive while watching a spring training game.
